vulnerability.name: USN-5587-1
vulnerability.description: Axel Chong discovered that when curl accepted and sent back cookies containing control bytes that a HTTP(S) server might return a 400 (Bad Request Error) response. A malicious cookie host could possibly use this to cause denial-of-service.

statements.status_notes: curl could be denied access to a HTTP(S) content if it recieved a specially crafted cookie.
